00040 require_once($MODEL_PATH.'dansguardian.php');
00041 
00042 class Dansguardianlogs extends Dansguardian
00043 {
00044     public $Name= 'dansguardianlogs';
00045     
00046     public $LogFile= '/var/log/dansguardian/access.log';
00047 
00048     function ParseLogLine($logline, &$cols)
00049     {
00050         global $Re_Ip;
00051 
00052         $re_datetime= '(\d+\.\d+\.\d+) (\d+:\d+:\d+)';
00053         $re_pip= "($Re_Ip|-)";
00054         $re_srcip= "($Re_Ip)";
00055         $re_link= '(http:\/\/[^ \/]*|https:\/\/[^ \/]*)(\S*)';
00056         $re_result= '(.*|)';
00057         $re_mtd= '(GET|POST|HEAD|PROPFIND|PROPPATCH|CONNECT)';
00058         $re_size= '(\d+)';
00059         $re_ttl= '(-{0,1}\d+)';
00060         $re_rest= '(.*)';
00061         
00062         $re_nonempty= '(\S+|)';
00063         $re_num= '(-{0,1}\d+|)';
00064         $re_restorempty= '(.*|)';
00065         
00066         // 2007.12.29 20:46:18 - 192.168.1.33 http://URL.com *DENIED* Banned site: URL.com GET 0 0 Cleaning Domains 1 403 -   -
00067         // 2007.12.29 20:10:15 - 192.168.1.34 http://URL.com  GET 1632 0  1 404 text/html   -
00068         // 2007.12.29 20:09:57 - 192.168.1.34 http://URL.com *SCANNED*  GET 5137 -20  1 200 text/html   -
00069         $re= "/^$re_datetime\s+$re_pip\s+$re_srcip\s+$re_link\s+$re_result\s+$re_mtd\s+$re_size\s+$re_ttl\s+$re_restorempty\s*$re_num\s+$re_num\s+$re_rest$/";
00070         if (preg_match($re, $logline, $match)) {
00071             $cols['Date']= $match[1];
00072             $cols['Time']= $match[2];
00073             $cols['IPsrc']= $match[3];
00074             $cols['IP']= $match[4];
00075             $cols['Link']= $match[5].$match[6];
00076             $cols['Scan']= $match[7];
00077             $cols['Mtd']= $match[8];
00078             $cols['Size']= $match[9];
00079             $cols['TTL']= $match[10];
00080             $log= $match[11].' '.$match[12].' '.$match[13].' '.$match[14];
00082             if (preg_match('/(\S+)\s+(Domains|URLs|Sites|Phrases)/', $log, $cats)) {
00083                 $cols['Cat']= $cats[1];
00084             }
00085             $cols['Log']= $log;
00086             return TRUE;
00087         }
00088         else {
00089             $cols['IP']= _('Unknown');
00090             $cols['Link']= _('Unknown');
00091 
00092             $re= "/^$re_datetime$re_result\s+$re_mtd\s+$re_nonempty\s+$re_nonempty\s+$re_nonempty\s+$re_link\s+$re_rest$/";
00093             if (preg_match($re, $logline, $match)) {
00094                 $cols['Date']= $match[1];
00095                 $cols['Time']= $match[2];
00096                 $cols['Mtd']= $match[4];
00097                 $cols['Scan']= $match[6].' '.$match[3].' '.$match[5].' '.$match[7];
00098                 $cols['Link']= $match[8].$match[9];
00099                 $cols['Log']= $match[10];
00100                 return TRUE;
00101             }
00102             else if ($this->ParseSyslogLine($logline, $cols)) {
00103                 $cols['IP']= _('NA');
00104                 $cols['DateTime']= $cols['Date'].' '.$cols['Time'];
00105                 return TRUE;
00106             }
00107         }
00108         return FALSE;
00109     }
00110     
00111     function PostProcessCols(&$cols)
00112     {
00113         preg_match('|http://([^/]*)|', $cols['Link'], $match);
00114         $cols['Link']= $match[1];
00115 
00116         if (preg_match('/(\d+)\.(\d+)\.(\d+)/', $cols['Date'], $match)) {
00117             $cols['Date']= $match[1].'.'.sprintf('%02d', $match[2]).'.'.sprintf('%02d', $match[3]);
00118         }
00119 
00120         $time= explode(':', $cols['Time'], 3);
00121         $cols['Time']= sprintf('%02d', $time[0]).':'.sprintf('%02d', $time[1]).':'.sprintf('%02d', $time[2]);
00122     }
00123     
00124     function GetDateRegexp($date)
00125     {
00126         // Match all years
00127         $re= '.*\.';
00128         if ($date['Month'] == '') {
00129             $re.= '.*';
00130         }
00131         else {
00132             $re.= $date['Month'].'\.';
00133             if ($date['Day'] == '') {
00134                 $re.= '.*';
00135             }
00136             else {
00137                 $re.= $date['Day'];
00138             }
00139         }
00140         return $re;
00141     }
00142 }
